future.title: Future Sustainability
future.description: Around us are many individuals with great ability to create progress in the world. In order to drive progress in the world, we need to make an effort immediately. This platform is used to support existing progress by collaborating, educating, and defining actions to be taken to realize real change.

global.title: Global Impact
global.description: Creating worldwide positive change through sustainable development initiatives

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: Building strong partnerships to achieve sustainable development goals

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Developing creative solutions for sustainable future challenges

action.title: Action-Oriented
action.description: Taking concrete steps towards achieving sustainable development goals

sdgs.title: Sustainable Development Goals
sdgs.subtitle: Unsoed Contribution to The SDGs Goal
sdgs.description: Every year, Unsoed will report on its contribution to the global SDGs by identifying activities at Unsoed that are relevant to the SDGs. This reporting will provide a clear perspective on the sustainability goals and help set significant targets.

1.title: No poverty
1.description: End poverty in all its forms everywhere

2.title: Zero hunger
2.description: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition

3.title: Good health and well-being
3.description: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages

4.title: Quality education
4.description: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education

5.title: Gender quality
5.description: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls

6.title: Clean water and sanitation
6.description: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation

7.title: Affordable and clean energy
7.description: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy

8.title: Decent work and economic growth
8.description: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth

9.title: Industry, innovation, and infrastructure
9.description: Build resilient infrastructure and promote sustainable industrialization

10.title: Reduced inequalities
10.description: Reduce inequality within and among countries

11.title: Sustainable cities and communities
11.description: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable

12.title: Responsible consumption and production
12.description: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns

13.title: Climate action
13.description: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts

14.title: Life below water
14.description: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources

15.title: Life on land
15.description: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems

16.title: Peace, justice, and strong institutions
16.description: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development

17.title: Partnerships for the goals
17.description: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize global partnership

footer.address: LPPM Building UNSOED 3rd Floor, Dr. Soeparno Street, Karangwangkal, Purwokerto, Central Java 53122

newsletter.title: Subscribe to our newsletter
newsletter.description: Get the latest updates about our programs and activities

description.first: To facilitate and synergize Unsoed's activities in the fields of education, teaching, and community service (Tridharma), Unsoed is committed to establishing the SDGs Center to explore, collect, develop, and disseminate knowledge that benefits sustainable development and welfare for society.
description.inauguration: Unsoed SDGs Center was then inaugurated by the Ministry of National Development Planning (Bappenas) on December 18, 2024 at Java Heritage Hotel, Purwokerto.
description.second: To achieve the Sustainable Development Goals as a national development goal, the Unsoed SDGs Center plays a role in achieving the Sustainable Development Goals by providing innovations and solutions for SDGs, creating current and future SDGs implementers, showing how to support, adopt, and implement SDGs, and developing cross-sectoral partnerships and leadership as a guide in responding to SDGs.

partnerships.title: Partnerships for Sustainability
partnerships.description: Unsoed partners with various donor agencies, governments, community-based organizations, non-governmental organizations (NGOs), businesses, and other intermediaries to expand its reach and gain benefits to support shared sustainability goals.

highlights.title: Project Highlights
highlights.description: Highlighting existing projects at Unsoed by presenting a news list containing information on initiative updates. The newsletters communicate the progress of initiatives that support sustainability goals and tangible results.

mapping.title: Research Mapping
mapping.description: By making a meaningful contribution, Unsoed expands the scope and rationale of its research for development strategy by fully considering the 17 core needs in the Sustainable Development Goals.

exploration.title: Research Exploration
exploration.description: Exploring innovative solutions for sustainable development challenges

analysis.title: Data Analysis
analysis.description: Analyzing impact and effectiveness of initiatives

collaboration.title: Research Collaboration
collaboration.description: Building partnerships for shared research goals

education.title: Education for Sustainable Development
education.description: In order to promote a more just and sustainable society, Unsoed supports education that helps people change their knowledge, skills, values and attitudes. In addition, Unsoed also equips people to meet the needs of each individual through an integrated and balanced approach to sustainable development.

seminar.title: Seminar
seminar.description: A meeting that aims to realize sustainable development for university members and the general public.

workshop.title: Workshop
workshop.description: A series of gatherings involving many individuals to discuss, learn, and work, which includes individual engagement in realizing sustainable development as an outreach to university members and the general public.

course.title: Course
course.description: A series of learning conducted over a period of time on knowledge and skills relevant to the goal of realizing sustainable development, both for university members and the general public.

community.title: Community Service
community.description: Community service and empowerment programs are an important part of Unsoed. Unsoed has conducted community service activities for students integrated through the Real Work Lecture (KKN) program as well as various services carried out which aim to achieve sustainable goals.

programs.title: Our Programs
programs.description: Discover how we engage with and empower communities through various sustainable development initiatives.

kkn.title: Real Work Lecture (KKN)
kkn.description: An integrated program where students engage directly with communities, implementing sustainable development practices and solutions.

publication.title: SDGs Publications
publication.description: Unsoed SDGs Publication as a forum needed to be able to support SDGs in Indonesia in terms of innovation and sustainable implementation of SDGs in society by presenting publications that contain information about the linkage of existing activities with sustainability goals and tangible results.

mapping.title: SDGs Implementation Mapping
mapping.description: Explore how Unsoed maps and aligns university activities with SDGs objectives and implementation.

course.title: Course Integration
course.description: Integration of SDGs content in courses and KKN programs

ownership.title: SDGs Ownership
ownership.description: Building a sense of ownership towards SDGs implementation

priorities.title: Strategic Planning
priorities.description: Identifying priorities, opportunities, and global action plans

internalization.title: SDGs Internalization
internalization.description: Ensuring continuous SDGs internalization across university elements

expert.title: Our Experts
expert.description: Meet our dedicated team of experts working towards sustainable development goals.
